Name: Mule's Hind Leg
Ingredients: 20 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: STIR (or SHAKE) all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Gin and apple brandy enriched with apricot and Bénédictine liqueurs along with maple syrup.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Mule's Hind Leg contains 210 calories
